attributes.action: limit mp's pay rise to 1% and remove the final salary pensions.
attributes.additional_details:
Mp's have requested an average 32% pay rise , while limiting benefit rises for some of the poorest in society to 1%.
Let them show we are all in it together by limiting them to a 1%rise and removing the final salary pension scheme.
Lets face it they won't be going to a food bank anytime soon as it is.
